name: Pay for picture Vol.01
description:
characterization


『Pay for picture』 is a otaku-to-leisure puzzle game where you can restore the picture by clicking on the square.
The game supports DLC download, which can recover the feeling of social security game.
There is no unlock time and rating system in the game, and you can fully devote yourself to a happy mood. (๑•̀ᄇ•́)و✧

Characteristics


■ 100 achievements worth collecting

■ New Style of Painting

■ All pictures move ()

■ DLC Download

■ Can take off clothes (after covering DLC)

■ One-click Finish
